items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.
items.title: trifkee/NavKit: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.

items.content_html: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently. A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.
items.title: nigrosimone/turbo-array: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently.  A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.

items.content_html: A simple and interactive stopwatch built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to start, stop, and reset the timer with a smooth and responsive UI. Features : Start, pause, and reset functionality , Precise time tracking in milliseconds ,Responsive and user-friendly design , Lightweight and efficient performance
items.title: surya4824/Stop-Watch: A simple and interactive stopwatch built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to start, stop, and reset the timer with a smooth and responsive UI.   Features : Start, pause, and reset functionality , Precise time tracking in milliseconds ,Responsive and user-friendly design , Lightweight and efficient performance

items.content_html: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.
items.title: GWMDhananjaya/React-color-picker: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.

items.content_html: Data Fetch React is a lightweight and efficient React.js application designed to demonstrate seamless API data fetching and rendering. It provides a simple yet powerful example of integrating external APIs with React‚Äôs component-based architecture. Built with Vite, the project ensures fast performance and optimized loading.
items.title: Argus-66/DataFetchReact: Data Fetch React is a lightweight and efficient React.js application designed to demonstrate seamless API data fetching and rendering. It provides a simple yet powerful example of integrating external APIs with React‚Äôs component-based architecture. Built with Vite, the project ensures fast performance and optimized loading.
